methods.name: <init>

params.name: minDate
params.comment: minimum value for spinner model. (Can be null)

params.name: maxDate
params.comment: maximum value for spinner model. (Can be null)

params.name: calendarField
params.comment:
specifies the year, month, or day to increment/decrement. One of:
  
    Calendar.YEAR
    Calendar.MONTH
    Calendar.DAY_OF_MONTH

methods.javadoc:
Returns the current minimum allowed date.
@return the current minimum allowed date.
methods.name: getMinDate
methods.comment: Returns the current minimum allowed date.

methods.javadoc:
Returns the current maximum allowed date.
@return the current maximum allowed date.
methods.name: getMaxDate
methods.comment: Returns the current maximum allowed date.

methods.javadoc:
Specifies whether the increment/decrement methods should adjust the year, month, or day. @param calendarField one of
  • Calendar.YEAR
  • Calendar.MONTH
  • Calendar.DAY_OF_MONTH
methods.name: setCalendarField
methods.comment: Specifies whether the increment/decrement methods should adjust the year, month, or day.
